Gene-commentary.Gene-commentary_text: genetic analysis and mapping of the porcine glucocerebrosidase (GBA) gene
Ubiquitous expression in lung (RPKM 37.7), spleen (RPKM 23.7) and 8 other tissues
lung; spleen; subcutaneous adipose; ovary; mixtures; kidney; liver; heart; longissimus dorsi muscle; psoas major muscle;
